metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000107 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: inets in Erlang possibly 22.1 and earlier follows RFC 3875 section 4.1.18 and therefore does not protect applications from the presence of untrusted client data in the HTTP_PROXY environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to redirect an application's outbound HTTP traffic to an arbitrary proxy server via a crafted Proxy header in an HTTP request, aka an "httpoxy" issue.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> we will not be fixing this in erlang, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: erlang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
